With real-time responsiveness, emotional control and industry-leading voice cloning, ElevenLabs has become a go-to solution for podcasters, filmmakers, game studios and educators seeking high-quality narration without recording equipment.

The platform combines accessibility with professional fidelity, offering beginner-friendly browser tools alongside a powerful API for developers.

name: Adobe Podcast
description:
Adobe Podcast is an AI-powered audio platform that helps anyone create clean, clear and professional-sounding voice recordings. Even if you only have a laptop microphone, its tools automatically remove background noise, fix unclear speech and improve overall clarity so your audio sounds polished.

The platform focuses on simplicity. Instead of using a complex timeline, you can edit your audio through a text transcript, which makes it easy to remove mistakes or rearrange content. Features like automatic volume leveling, remote guest recording and smart cleanup tools help creators save time and avoid the frustrations of traditional audio editing.

Adobe Podcast is ideal for podcasters, educators, marketers and anyone who needs high quality voice content without expensive studio gear. Whether you are recording interviews, lessons or voiceovers, the platform helps you sound confident and professional with minimal effort.

name: Cleanvoice AI
description:
Cleanvoice AI is designed to clean up voice recordings quickly and automatically, which makes it perfect for creators who want smooth and professional audio without learning complicated editing tools. The platform removes filler words like “um” and “uh”, takes out mouth noises, reduces background sounds and smooths over awkward silences so your recordings feel natural and polished.

The tool is especially helpful for people who speak freely on camera or in podcasts. Instead of spending hours removing small mistakes by hand, Cleanvoice does the work for you, making the editing process fast and stress free. You simply upload your audio and receive a cleaner version ready for publishing.

Cleanvoice is a great fit for podcasters, YouTubers, interviewers and educators who want clear voice content that is easy to listen to. It helps your message stand out by removing distractions and delivering a crisp final result.

The tool is a strong option for studios, game developers, marketers and creators who want unique and expressive voice content without relying on constant manual recording. Whether you are building characters, producing ads or designing an AI assistant, Resemble AI makes it easy to bring your audio to life.

Podcastle is perfect for beginners and professionals who want an organised workflow for interviews, solo episodes or scripted content. With its mix of easy editing tools and powerful AI features, it helps you produce consistent, polished audio every time.

The tool is also helpful for developers and learners. It can write code, fix errors and explain programming concepts in simple terms, which makes it a helpful companion for both beginners and experienced professionals. ChatGPT can break down complex topics into easy explanations and provide examples to help you understand new skills.

Many people use ChatGPT for everyday tasks like drafting emails, summarising documents or coming up with ideas for creative projects. It is flexible, friendly and designed to support anyone who wants to work faster and understand things more clearly.

Perplexity is ideal for anyone who needs a reliable way to explore new topics, check facts or learn quickly. Its mix of accuracy and simplicity makes it an excellent tool for studying, researching or understanding subjects at a deeper level.

name: Canva
description:
Canva combines a simple design interface with AI features that help users create professional visuals quickly. Its tools support everything from social media graphics to presentations and the built-in AI can generate images, suggest layouts and adjust designs automatically to fit your project.

The platform is designed for non-designers, which means you can drag, drop and customise elements without any experience. AI features help refine your design, choose colors, fix spacing and create content that looks clean and modern. Canva also offers thousands of templates that users can personalise in minutes.

name: Elicit

AlphaFold is an AI system that predicts the three dimensional shapes of proteins based on their amino acid sequences. Understanding these shapes is important because they help explain how proteins function in the body and how they interact with other molecules including medicines.

Scientists use AlphaFold to explore biological questions that were previously very slow or costly to study through experiments alone. The tool provides quick and reliable predictions that guide research in fields like genetics, disease biology and drug discovery. This accelerates scientific progress and opens new paths for exploration.

AlphaFold has become an essential resource for labs and research organisations around the world. It makes advanced biological insights more accessible and supports discoveries that can lead to better treatments and a deeper understanding of life at the molecular level.

name: Squirro
description:
Squirro is a platform that uses AI to analyse enterprise data and surface insights for business teams. It pulls information from different systems and presents it in a way that highlights patterns, risks and opportunities. This helps decision makers move beyond raw numbers.

The tool can support areas like customer intelligence, risk management and operational efficiency. It shows relevant insights within the tools people already use, which makes it easier to act on findings. Teams can see context around key events rather than isolated metrics.

Squirro is well suited for financial institutions and data-heavy organisations that want a clearer view of their information. It turns scattered data into practical guidance for strategy and daily operations.
subtitle: Turn scattered enterprise data into actionable insights for revenue, service and risk teams.

name: HPE
description:
HPE provides hardware and software solutions that help organisations run AI and data workloads at scale. It offers servers, storage and cloud services that are tuned for machine learning and analytics. This gives enterprises the infrastructure they need to support demanding AI projects.

Alongside infrastructure, HPE provides tools for managing, monitoring and optimising AI systems. Teams can deploy models, move data securely and integrate AI into their existing IT landscape. This helps large organisations work with advanced technology in a reliable way.

HPE is a strong partner for companies with complex environments and strict requirements. It supports long-term AI strategies by combining performance, security and manageability.

name: Exalate
description:
Exalate helps teams keep data in sync between platforms like Jira, ServiceNow, Salesforce and GitHub. It manages bi-directional updates so changes in one system are reflected in another automatically. This removes the need for manual copying or duplicate entry.

The platform is flexible enough to handle different workflows and mapping rules for each connection. Teams can control which fields sync, how often updates happen and how conflicts are handled. This ensures each system stays accurate while still fitting local needs.

Exalate is useful for organisations that rely on multiple tools across departments or partners. It keeps everyone aligned while allowing each group to continue using the software that works best for them.
subtitle: Sync issues, tickets and records across tools with customisable, bi-directional integration.

Support for complex collaboration scenarios across companies

Scalable architecture for large enterprise deployments

name: Suse
description:
Suse AI supports enterprise teams that want to deploy and manage AI workloads on open-source infrastructure. It builds on Suse’s experience with Linux and cloud technologies to provide a stable base for modern applications. This helps organisations run AI systems with confidence and control.

The platform focuses on reliability, security and flexibility. Teams can choose where to run their workloads, integrate with existing tools and maintain compliance with internal policies. Suse AI provides guidance and tooling rather than locking users into a single approach.

For companies that value open-source technology and hybrid environments, Suse AI offers a path to adopt AI at scale. It helps bridge the gap between innovative models and the operational demands of enterprise IT.

name: Teachmate AI
description:
Teachmate AI helps teachers create classroom materials more quickly using simple prompts. Educators can ask for lesson plans, worksheets or quiz questions and receive ready-made content that they can adjust to match their students. This reduces preparation time while still allowing for personal teaching style.

The tool can adapt materials to different age groups and difficulty levels. It can also suggest activities that support discussion, practice and assessment. Teachers remain in control, using Teachmate AI as a starting point rather than a replacement for their expertise.

Teachmate AI is valuable for busy educators who juggle many classes and responsibilities. It helps them focus more on teaching and student support while spending less time staring at a blank planning template.

name: AmpCode
description:
AmpCode lets users turn text descriptions into working websites and applications. You describe what you want your app to do, and AmpCode generates the structure, layout and basic logic. This makes it much easier for non-developers to bring digital ideas to life.

Users can then refine and customise their projects through a guided interface. Teams can prototype features, gather feedback and update the app without needing to rebuild everything. This speeds up experimentation and reduces reliance on full-time engineering resources for early-stage ideas.

AmpCode is ideal for founders, product managers and small teams who want to move from concept to demo quickly. It lowers the technical barrier and encourages more people to participate in software creation.

AI features assist with summarising updates, generating task descriptions and highlighting what needs attention. This helps teams stay on top of their workload without reading every message in detail.

The platform supports boards, timelines and dashboards that give a clear view of progress. Teams can customise workflows for different departments such as marketing, product or operations. Automation rules take care of repetitive actions like assigning tasks or sending reminders.

Monday.com is used by companies of all sizes to keep work visible and coordinated. It reduces clutter, supports collaboration and gives everyone a shared understanding of what is happening across projects.

Wrike is well suited for marketing teams, agencies and operations groups that need clear coordination. It turns scattered tasks into structured plans and helps teams deliver projects more reliably.

name: Jotform
type: AI Form Builder & Data Collection Platform
description:
Jotform helps individuals and teams create forms, surveys and data collection workflows without needing technical skills. Its AI tools assist with generating form questions, structuring layouts and recommending fields based on what the user wants to collect, which speeds up the entire creation process.

Users can build everything from contact forms and event registrations to feedback surveys and application forms. Once responses come in, Jotform automatically organises the data into tables, reports and visual summaries that are easy to share. This removes the need to manually sort through entries or build reports from scratch.

Jotform is especially helpful for educators, small businesses, nonprofits and teams that regularly gather information. It turns the entire process from form creation to data analysis into a smooth, beginner friendly experience that works right in the browser.

name: JustDone
description:
JustDone provides a suite of AI tools designed to help users write, research and generate ideas quickly. Whether someone needs an email draft, an article outline or a batch of content ideas, JustDone can produce helpful starting points that save time and reduce creative pressure.

The platform supports many content formats such as blog posts, summaries, product descriptions and messages for social media. It also includes tools for rewriting text, checking clarity and generating variations so users can refine their writing without starting over. This helps both beginners and experienced writers move past blank-page frustration.

JustDone is a useful companion for students, marketers, freelancers and anyone who writes frequently. It accelerates brainstorming, simplifies research and supports smoother day-to-day writing across a wide range of tasks.

Jasper is widely used by marketing departments, agencies and growing businesses. It combines strong writing assistance with brand control features so teams can scale their content output without sacrificing quality or consistency.

SlidesGo also offers templates tailored to common formats like lessons, reports and proposals.

Teachers, students, professionals and creators rely on SlidesGo when they need to deliver presentations that look clean and engaging. It removes design barriers and helps users focus on delivering their message.

name: Clippit
description:
Clippit automatically turns long videos into short, shareable clips by identifying important moments and trimming them into highlight-ready segments. Instead of manually scrubbing through footage, users can upload a video and let the platform detect key parts such as reactions, transitions or noteworthy dialogue.

The system produces clean, ready-to-post clips that work well for social media, marketing, training or content recaps. Users can adjust length, captions and formatting to match the platform they are posting to. This makes repurposing long content into multiple smaller pieces fast and effortless.

Clippit is valuable for creators, brands, educators and streamers who produce long-form video but want to share quick highlights across different platforms. It cuts down editing time and helps users consistently publish engaging, short-form content.
subtitle: Automatically find highlights and turn long videos into short, shareable clips.
